org.kepler.job.JobManager

    org.kepler.job  

    • Uses of JobManager in org.kepler.job

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JobManager JobManagerFactory.get(java.lang.String jmgrID)
      return an existing job manager
      static JobManager JobManagerFactory.get(java.lang.String supportname, java.lang.String target)
      return an existing job manager
      static JobManager JobManagerFactory.get(java.lang.String supportname, java.lang.String target, java.lang.String binPath)
      return an existing job manager OR create one now
      Methods in org.kepler.job with parameters of type JobManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Job.reconnect(JobManager jobmanager)
      Reconnect to a executing job.
      java.lang.String Job.submit(JobManager jobmanager, boolean overwrite, java.lang.String options)
      Submit a job, called from Job.submit(); boolean overwrite indicates whether old files that exist on the same directory should be removed before staging new files.
